mapper.insert:
select COMP_MEMBER_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into comp_member(CM_NO,CM_ID,CM_PWD,CM_REGNUM,CM_NAME,CM_REPRE,CM_MANAGER,CM_MGR_TEL,CM_ADDR,CM_DETAILADDR,CM_ZIPCODE,CM_EMAIL,CC_NO) values(#{cmNo},#{cmId},#{cmPwd},#{cmRegnum},#{cmName},#{cmRepre},#{cmManager},#{cmMgrTel},#{cmAddr},#{cmDetailAddr},#{cmZipcode},#{cmEmail},#{ccNo})
mapper.select: select CM_PWD from comp_member where CM_ID=#{cmId}
